com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.controller

Class CacheController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.controller.CacheController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller, org.jboss.cache.TreeCacheListener

    public class CacheController
extends Object
implements Controller, org.jboss.cache.TreeCacheListener
    The Cache controller takes incoming requests and places them on a distributed cache (JBoss TreeCache). The cache controller also listens to events on the cache. If an event that concerns this node, then event will generate a request that will be routed to the attached downhandler. This allows for distributed asynchronous calls.
